TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Richard_Atha, title = Richard_Atha, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Atha} }

S.FORM: Richard E. Atha (Dick Atha) sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1931, ryax sa tay 21 nqu tay 9, Richard Atha, squliq na p'unro.
